bibl.title: Ancient Greece and Ancient Iran. Cross-Cultural Encounters. 1st International Conference.
bibl.seg: Darbandi Seyed Mohammad Reza and Antigoni Zournatzi (Edd.), Ancient Greece and Ancient Iran. Cross-Cultural Encounters. 1st International Conference (Athens, 11-13 November 2006).
